::Halucigen::
Halucigen's hallucinated bots began attacking the base with fury, but 
not actually doing any damage. It would be cpnfusing however.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> One by one the mines exploded, each one that detonated sent a 
signal to the
> next one making that one stronger.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2001 2:31 PM
> Subject: Re: Where did they all come from
> 
> 
> > ::Neody::
> >
> > Neody finally arrives on the scene, breathing hard from running 
all the
> way from the other Destron base. He fires two pods into the ground, 
watching
> them bury and tracing them with his mind as they head underground 
toward one
> of the stasis cannons on the base.
